creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: 3/4 bust of male figure with long hair, glasses, and a long goatee; image area is circular
marks:
Signature, Inscription

inscribed in plate at bo signed in plate, lower left: [CH Jacque]
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until March 4, 1992; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Head of a Man
